Any user changes after the first day of the current accounting period will be cancelled during the recalculation.
Do you wish to continue?

konrolaDanOdpisuUkoncitProcesDotaz.titl: Do you really want to end the ongoing tax depreciation check?

leasingNelzeGenerovatNeplatnyZavazek.titl: Error has occurred during validation of obligation to leasing '%p' and to schedule of payments with date '%p' and code '%p' :

leasingNelzeGenerovatPredUcetnimObdobi.titl: It is not possible to generate schedule of payments and tax expenses of leasing before current accounting period.

leasingNelzeGenerovatZavazekUhrazen.titl: It is not possible to generate the leasing because obligation has already been settled.

leasingNelzeSmazatZavazekUhrazen.titl: Leasing cannot be removed because obligation has already been settled.

leasingWizChybiRadaDokladu.titl: Filled type of document doesn't have document row number entered and none is specified.

leasingWizChybiRocniPolozkaRady.titl: Selected document type does not specify a numerical range of annual appropriations for the next financial year.

leasingWizNenalezenaSazbaDph.titl: Rate value wasn't found for given VAT rate type. Instalments will not be calculated correctly.

leasingWizSazbyNenacteny.titl: Reading of valid VAT rates settings failed. Generation of lease payments won't work correctly.

leasingWizardBezSplNeboVypl.titl: On the form you must fill in all data or zero number of payments.

leasingWizardSplatkySePrekryvaji.titl: Lease instalment not overlap. Check the entered dates.

majKontrolaKonec.titl:
Recommended procedure for calculating the amounts that need to be set in the field Tax depreciation: 


DTax depreciation = 

+ <součet správných odpisů včetně měsíce, kdy odpisy měníme>

- <součet chybných odpisů bez měsíce, kdy odpisy měníme>


(the goal is to get to the correct amount for the sum of tax depreciation, so the next calculation will be based on the correct residual price) 

 Enter the correct balance into the Balance field.

majKontrolaNeniNovyOdpis.titl: Depreciation exists for an asset but should not.

majKontrolaNeniStaryOdpis.titl: Depreciation does not exist for an asset but should.

majKontrolaRuznaCastkaPoslOdpisu.titl: Last depreciation amount does not match (correct %p / current %p).

majKontrolaRuznaDelkaOdpisu.titl: Depreciation period does not match (correct %p / current %p).

majKontrolaRuznySoucetOdpisu.titl: Last depreciation total does not match (correct %p / current %p).

majKontrolaRuznyZustPoslOdpisu.titl: Last depreciation balance does not match (correct %p / current %p).

majKontrolaUvod.titl:
A difference was identified during a check of tax depreciation between the saved depreciation and the new calculations.
We recommend checking them and possibly correcting them using a user change in depreciation (see below for instructions on calculating the correct amount of depreciation).
Differences were identified in the case of the following assets:

majetekChybiSazbaOdpisu.titl: You must select depreciative rate for selected depreciation method.

majetekChybnaSazbaOdpisu.titl: Selected depreciation rate is incompatible with selected depreciation method.

majetekNehmotnyChybnyZpusOdpK.titl: For the selected type of assets the wrong method of depreciation is selected.

majetekNelzeGenerovatMimoObdobi.titl: It is not possible to generate depreciation schedule outside the accounting period in which the property was capitalized.

majetekNelzeGenerovatUdalost.titl: It is not possible to generate event with date %p and amount %p. Property price would be negative or zero.

majetekNelzeVlozitDoZamcenehoObdobi.titl: Property cannot be inserted into a locked period.

majetekNenalezenyOdpovidajiSazby.titl: No depreciable rates were found for selected depreciation method.

majetekNenulovyDanZustOdepsaneho.titl: Property has a non-zero balance, but it should have been already deducted according to the rate.

majetekNeodepisovanyNelzeGenerovat.titl: It is not possible to generate depreciation schedule for non-depreciable property.

majetekNeodepisovanySOdpisy.titl: Non-depreciable property cannot be depreciated. Depreciation transactions will be removed.

majetekNepodariloSeNajitDokladProVytvore.titl: It was not possible to find document for generate of property card.

majetekNevyplnenoDatumZarazeni.titl: Capitalization date is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoOdpisovyUcet.titl: Asset depreciation account is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoOpravnyUcet.titl: Accumulated depreciation account is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoPrimarniUcet.titl: Primary account is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoProtiUcet.titl: Offset account is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoSazba.titl: It is necessary to fill in depreciable group.

majetekNevyplnenoTypMajetku.titl: It is necessary to fill in property type.

majetekNevyplnenoUcetniOdpisy.titl: It is necessary to confirm whether you want to calculate accounting depreciation.

majetekNevyplnenoZacDanOdpisu.titl: Tax write-off date is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoZacUcetOdpisu.titl: Accounting depreciation start date is not filled in.

majetekNevyplnenoZpusobOdepis.titl: Depreciation method has not been selected.

majetekNevyplnenoZrychOdepis.titl: It is necessary to fill in the depreciation in the first year to enable accelerated depreciation.

majetekOdpisyDanDatumZacatkuPredZaraz.titl: Tax write-off date may not precede property capitalization date.

majetekOdpisyUcetDatumZacatkuPredZaraz.titl: Accounting depreciation start date may not precede property filing date.

majetekPocetMesicuNeniNenulovy.titl: Number of months must have non-zero value.

majetekPocetMesicuNenulovyZustCenaNula.titl: If the number of months of accounting depreciation is specified, the amortised cost must not be zero.

majetekProcentoNeniNenulove.titl: Percent per year must have non-zero value.

majetekSazbaOdpisuNulovaDobaOdp.titl: A zero depreciation rate cannot be used.

majetekSpadaDoJinehoObdobi.titl: It is not possible to record property that is entered into a different accounting period.

majetekTechZhodnocenJenDriveOdepsany.titl: Assets that have not been previously depreciated cannot be technically evaluated before classification.

majetekUcetniOdpisyVDE.titl: Accounting depreciation cannot be generated in the tax record.

majetekUcetniOdpisyVDE_SK.titl: Accounting depreciation cannot be generated in simple accounting.

nepodariloSeAktualizovatMajetky.titl: The change in accounting period failed to recalculate depreciation of assets.

nepodariloSeSpocitatMajetky.titl: When the accounting period was changed, the number of assets to update depreciation could not be determined.

odpisyZacatekPredUcobd.titl: Asset [%p] - the start of depreciation %p precedes the accounting period %p!

odpisyZmenaObdobiZamceno.titl: Failed to change the depreciation value, because the period (%p) is locked.

sazbaChybaZjisteniNavazanychMajetku.titl: It was not possible to verify whether there are already-registered properties linked to depreciation rate.

splatKalSumDphNevyplneno.titl: VAT must be filled in for given VAT rate.

udalostDveNeboViceVyrazeni.titl: It is possible to retire a property only once.

udalostDveNeboViceZarazeni.titl: It is possible to capitalize property only once.

udalostMinHodnotaProdlouzeni.titl: The value of the %p field must be greater than zero.

udalostMusiMitDatVystVAktualnimObdobi.titl: Event date must be in a period that is valid for current project.

udalostNaDanOpdisyPredZacDanOdpisu.titl: Event date must be later than initiation of accounting depreciation.

udalostNaUceOpdisyPredZacUceOdpisu.titl: Event date must be later than initialization of accounting depreciation.

udalostNePoVyrazeni.titl: No event may occur after event retirement of the property.

udalostNePredZarazenim.titl: No event may occur before capitalization.

udalostNeexistujiUcetPolozky.titl: No accounting depreciation would exist to date {0}

udalostNelzePridatVyrazeni.titl: It is not possible to add new event after retiring property.

udalostNemaVyplnenoStredisko.titl: Event must include valid cost centre.

udalostNesmiBytPredZacOdpisu.titl: Event date must be later than initiation of tax and accounting depreciation.

udalostOpetZahDanBezPreruseni.titl: It is not possible to re-initiate tax depreciation, because tax depreciation has not been interrupted.

udalostOpetZahUcetBezPreruseni.titl: It is not possible to re-initiate accounting depreciation, because accounting depreciation has not been interrupted

udalostPoPreruseniJenomUrciteUdal.titl: It is not possible to add this event, because depreciation was aborted.

udalostPredDatemZarazeni.titl: Event date may be older than property capitalization date.

udalostPrerDanOdpJizPreruseno.titl: It is not possible to interrupt tax depreciation, because tax depreciation has already been interrupted.

udalostPrerUcetOdpJizPreruseno.titl: It is not possible to interrupt accounting depreciation, because accounting depreciation has already been interrupted.

udalostSumZklTZNesmiBytZaporna.titl: The %p field value must not be negative for technical evaluation.

udalostVyplnitVsechnyUcty.titl: All accounts must be filled in during this event.

udalostVyrazeniNesmazat.titl: It is not possible to remove retirement event, if other events are linked to it.

udalostZarazeniJizObsazena.titl: Capitalization event is already included in event list.

udalostZarazeniMusiBytPredZacOdpisu.titl: Capitalization must precede initiation of depreciation.
